example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اتبع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (PVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اغنية) (S-TTL (PUNC ") (NP-VOC (PRT (VOC_PART يا)) (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC نبض) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الضفة))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J تهدأ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *))) (PUNC ")))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: with the song " Pulse of the Bank don't be still"
